review:
** **** *** ********** **** *** ********* **** ***** ***** * ***** ** * ****** *** ****** **** *******
Doctor was very friendly and the explanation of the particular illnesses  of the patient is very impressive, specially  viral fevers. Doctor gave us strength .
Dr. Rahul Gandhi is very empathetic. He understands the issue and does analysis comprehensively. He is very patient-friendly. One of the best physicians to go to
Doctor was in hurry and didn't do the check up thoroughly. He quickly wrote the medicines and his job was done
Good explanation, patient friendly, good interaction. Clarifications of different doubts and advises that is necessary.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Covishield vaccination was given with atmost care and according to the guidelines.
Hospital was clean and higenic.
Hospital administration is very good.

I went to get idea about one week old knee wound.
I was expecting Dr will take a look at the wound and probably some professional dressing will be provided.

But Dr. Didn't even open the bandage and look at the wound... I paid 580(consultation+ medicine).

I felt for 300 rs Dr can at least look at t wound.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He is not only good doctor but really kind and reachable person such a well known doctor but still available to respond and advise in critical time.Thanks @Rahul sir for your advice and tritament for my wife Yamini she is recovering now.
